EmailTemplate.description: Mail alert to assignee & assigner two days prior to end date
EmailTemplate.name: Alert Mail 2 days prior to end date
EmailTemplate.subject: Asset Expiration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi
This is to inform that your access to the Asset is going to expire in 48 Hours. Kindly check below for further details: Asset: '{!Asset_Assignment__c.Asset__c}' Assignment No. : '{!Asset_Assignment__c.Name}' Please click here to review.
